channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-13813] TestDelegationTokenFetcher#testDelegationTokenWithoutRenewer is failing
item.description:
HADOOP-13720 added more info to the msgs printed in AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager for better supportability, which is good. Unfortunately the unit test TestDelegationTokenFetcher#testDelegationTokenWithoutRenewer that asserts the message string was not updated accordingly. The unit test is failing in both trunk and branch-2 branches, see example builds 1, 2, and 3.

This JIRA is to track the effort of fixing this.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Ping yzhangal and xiaochen for review. Thanks,

Thanks liuml07 for catching and fixing this! Sorry to have missed this in HADOOP-13720.... precommit didn't trigger this component...

+1 pending jenkins.

+1 overall

Committed to trunk through branch-2.8 branches. Thanks xiaochen for your review.

precommit didn't trigger this component...

Maybe it has something to do with the generics. If pre-commit does not remind us, it's almost mission impossible to cover all related code for a change

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #10829 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/10829/)
